attributes.action: reduce tax on diesel to bring it back in line with petrol prices
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: in the last 10 years diesel has gone from 2 pence a litre less than petrol to 7 pence more than petrol.this could be done with a small increase in the tax on petrol.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
False or incomplete name or address information
